goal.ch: 學生在此課程中將會學到振動與噪音相關原理、量測設備與分析技術之認知與振動與噪音控制技術於工程實務上之應用。
goal.en: In this course, students will learn the principles of vibration and noise, the knowledge of measurement equipments and analysis technologies, and the application of vibration and noise control technologies in engineering practices.

outline.ch:
課程大綱如下
• 振動原理與特性
• 振動量測
• 振動控制技術與應用
• 噪音原理與特性
• 噪音量測
•  噪音控制與應用
• 噪音與振動影響評估
outline.en:
The course syllabus is as follows:
• Vibration Principle and Characteristics
• Vibration Measurements
• Vibration Control Technologies and Applications
• Noise Principle and Characteristics
• Noise Measurements
• Noise Control and Applications
• Noise and Vibration Impact Assessment

textbook.ch:
授課教師準備的講義
1. Noise and Vibration Analysis, Signal Analysis and Experimental Procedures, Wiley, 2011
2. Theory of Vibration Protection, Springer,2016
textbook.en:
Lecture notes by instructor
1. Noise and Vibration Analysis, Signal Analysis and Experimental Procedures, Wiley, 2011
2. Theory of Vibration Protection, Springer,2016

gradMethod.ch:
作業: 30％
期中測驗與專案計畫書: 30％
期末專案書面與口頭報告: 40％
gradMethod.en:
Homeworks:30％
Midterm and Project Proposal: 30％
Final project report and presentation: 40％
